channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Sotheby's and Yuga Labs respond to lawsuit from Bored Ape investors
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Art broker Sotheby's has been named in the Bored Ape investors case against NFT company Yuga Labs, which said that the new allegations are without merit and described the complaint as "opportunistic."

item.title: Google upgrades search engine with AI-powered enhancements
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Google asserts that generative AI streamlines search functions, enabling individuals to discover novel perspectives and insights more effortlessly.

item.title: Bitcoin bulls risk trading range loss as BTC price nears 2-month lows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin almost breaks down from its sideways construction in place for months, and Bitcoin bulls are struggling to prop up the market.

item.title: Bitcoin mining researchers claim new tech ups winning hash chance by 260%
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: U.K.-based research company Quantum Blockchain Technologies has developed algorithmic search methods that boost Bitcoin mining efficiency and reward probability.

item.title: Shibarium executive issues strong warning about exploitation risks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Shiba Inu’s marketing strategist Lucie has offered instructions to help users reduce the risk of encountering phishing links and fraudulent schemes when using Shibarium.

item.title: Axie Infinity’s play-to-earn ‘scheme’ alarms Phillippine National Police
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Playing crypto games can be riskier than investing in cryptocurrencies, according to the Filipino ACG, considering the ease with which gamers can lose their digital tokens and NFTs.

item.title: CME Group to launch BTC, ETH reference rates aimed at Asia’s investors
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: CME reported nearly half of its crypto volume year to date came from non-U.S. trading hours and around 11% from the Asia Pacific region.

item.title: SHIB, BONE, LEASH tokens dip amid rumors of $2.5M Shibarium gaffe
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Shiba Inu and related-token prices plunged since Shibarium's launch, while rumors of a significant technical error in the new Shibarium network have been swirling.

item.title: Coinbase futures approval seen as a major win amid the war on crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The recent approval allows Coinbase to join the ranks of the two major derivative exchanges in the United States, CME and CBOE.

item.title: Bitcoin price will surge past $150K if spot ETFs are approved: Analyst
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Even if the filings for Bitcoin spot ETFs are rejected, Lee predicts Bitcoin’s halving event will still push up BTC's price — but not to six figures.

item.title: Canadians are moving past crypto speculative trading: Coinbase country head
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The industry should build trust with retail consumers as Canada shifts to a digital economy, says Coinbase's country director for Canada, Lucas Matheson.

item.title: A Based week: Looking back at the first 7 days of Onchain Summer
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: In just one week, Base has attracted hundreds of thousands of new users, attention from mainstay brands and artists, and unfortunately, scammers as well.

item.title: El Salvador’s Bitcoiners teach 12-year-olds how to send sats
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Over 25,000 students in El Salvador have learned about Bitcoin in the classroom.

item.title: Ripple Labs bites back against SEC's request to file appeal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Ripple’s chief legal officer says there’s no “extraordinary circumstance” that warrant the Securities and Exchange Commission being able to appeal its partial loss while the case is still pending.

item.title: Strict Canadian crypto exchange rules allowed Kraken clarity to invest there, exec says
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Kraken’s Canada managing director told Cointelegraph in an interview that attaining restricted dealer status provided a clear regulatory pathway.

item.title: Canada’s regulatory clarity is bringing institutions to crypto — WonderFi CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Dean Skurka stated that although regulations have increased costs, they have also led to greater interest in crypto from institutions.

item.title: Shiba Inu’s Shibarium Ethereum L2 blockchain goes live on mainnet
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Shibarium’s beta phase saw a total of 21 million wallets on the L2, driving the interest of users months before the launch.

item.title: CoinSmart president says crypto taxes are a ‘little bit more favorable’ outside US
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to Jeremy Koven, Canadian crypto firms may have a better regulatory environment than ones in the United States, benefitting users in a number of ways.

item.title: Price analysis 8/16: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, DOGE, ADA, SOL, MATIC, LTC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Markets continue to slump, giving advantage to the bears and hinting at a trend change to the downside.

item.title: SwirlLend rugs on new Coinbase layer 2 Base as large number of scammers reported
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: SwirlLand is just the latest scam, but Coinbase tells Cointelegraph it is developing a monitoring tool to warn users of anomalies.

item.title: Binance.US request for protective order against SEC goes to magistrate judge
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The legal team for Binance.US filed a motion for a protective order on Aug. 14, claiming it was necessary to protect the firm from the SEC’s “fishing expedition” during discovery.

item.title: Star Trek NFT trademarks approved, y00ts coming to Ethereum: Nifty Newsletter
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: NFT project y00ts will return the $3 million it received from Polygon Labs and transfer to Ethereum.

item.title: Fantom DEX rescued at eleventh hour following planned shutdown
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: SpiritSwap previously had its entire treasury drained due to the ongoing Multichain exploit.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: why is the crypto market down
is crypto in a bear market
when will bitcoin price go up
item.description: Bitcoin price is down today as the crypto market reacts to the SEC’s delay on approving or denying the recent ETF applications and traders wait for the FOMC minutes from Jerome Powell.

item.title: Vitalik Buterin calls X’s Community Notes an example of ‘crypto values’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The Ethereum co-founder said the algorithm behind X’s tool to rate content as helpful and provide context was “surprisingly close to satisfying the ideal of credible neutrality.”

item.title: Breaking: Valkyrie files for Ether futures ETF with the SEC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Asset management firm Valkyrie filed for an Ether futures exchange-traded fund with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Aug. 16.

item.title: Satoshi-era Bitcoin awakens: 1,005 BTC mined in 2010 on the move
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: 1,005 BTC, valued at $29 million, has been moved from an old Bitcoin wallet after 13 years, drawing parallels to recent dormant BTC movements.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Should we ban ransomware payments? It’s an attractive but dangerous idea
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Christos Makridis
item.description: The U.S. and Australia are considering banning ransomware payments, but will it solve the problem, or harm people and destroy businesses?

item.title: Why is Litecoin’s price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: why is Litecoin price down today
item.description: Litecoin's price is down today, partly due to the "sell the news" sentiment following its Aug. 2 halving.
